Bishop Blay (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Liberia.
A mụrụ Blay na Liberia n'afọ 1980
N'oge agha obodo Liberia, Blay rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-etinye osisi rọba n'otu n'ime nnukwu ubi rọba na mba ahụ
Ọ gbagara Ghana ma biri n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ. N'oge ọ nọ n'ogige ahụ, ọ malitere ọzụzụ ime ihe nkiri ya site n'ime "ihe nkiri n'okporo ámá"
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Liberia. Blay rụkwara ọrụ n'ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala na Monrovia mgbe ọ na-adịghị eme ihe nkiri.
N'afọ 2015, Blay mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri Takeshi Fukunaga nke a kpọrọ "Out of My Hand"
Ọ na-egosiputa dika Cisco, onye na-etinye rọba nke na-etinye aka na esemokwu ọrụ, ma mesịa kpebie ịkwaga New York
Mgbe ọ rutere America, a manyere àgwà Blay ka ọ chee ihu n'oge gara aga ya

Katie Walsh nke Los Angeles Times dere na "Blay na-eweta ihe okike na obi ụtọ na arụmọrụ ya," na-ekwu na ọ "nwere ihu na-adọrọ adọrọ na ọbụna ihe ngosi na-adọkpụ". Ihe nkiri ahụ malitere na Berlin International Film Festival ma merie U.S
Fiction Award na Los Angeles Film Festival. Fukunaga chọpụtara Blay na nnyocha nke ya na Liberian Movie Union nwere, ma nwee mmasị na ikike Blay nwere igosipụta mmetụta site na ngosiputa ihu.
Dị ka àgwà ya, Blay kwagara New York iji kwalite ọrụ ya.
